name: Keno Prime
summary:
Do you love Keno? You will most certainly enjoy playing, as we give you Royal Treatment in our brand new Keno game! With more than 10 different premium rooms to choose from and counting..., it’s high quality designs and powerpack gameplay, unique features, you will have lot entertainment while playing Keno Prime. 
 
Try your luck with our Wheel Spin to get Huge Free Coins! 
 
Keno is very exciting and addictive game. Simply place your bet then choose between 2 and 10 numbers and then start rolling. Hit more numbers to win more! 
 
Why go anywhere when we have got the top features that will give you more and more fun and rewards! There is always something new coming: 
Powerups - New addition to gameplay which makes Keno Prime unique from the league. There are 6 different powerups to boost your winnings. 
Room Rewards - Every time you complete a successful room round you get Bonus reward on top of your total winnings. 
Collections - Collect virtual drinks and get bigger rewards! 
Achievements - Need more reward? See your objectives and complete them to earn huge rewards. 
Wheel Spin - Get daily free wheel spin to collect huge free coins. 
Daily login Bonus - Come back daily and get rewarded with more and more free coins. 
Gifts from friends - Need help? Your friends can send free gifts daily. 
VIP Class - Play more and seat in our elite class to earn more reward. 
Mega Wins - Share your joy with your friends on mega wins. 
 
Are you Classic Keno Player? No need to worry. We have Keno Prime Classic room specially designed for players like you. 
 
Hurry and Install Keno Prime now, you will discover an incredible Keno game.
